# Development Documentation

Current development notes, implementation guides, and technical documentation.

## Key Documents

- **[STATUS.md](STATUS.md)** - Current project status and progress
- **[ACCOMPLISHMENTS.md](ACCOMPLISHMENTS.md)** - Major milestones achieved
- **[DOCS_ORGANIZATION.md](DOCS_ORGANIZATION.md)** - Documentation organization plan

## Implementation Guides

This directory contains detailed documentation for specific features and fixes:

- File I/O implementation
- Statement implementations (CALL, DEF FN, WHILE, etc.)
- Parser and lexer fixes
- UI system changes (curses, urwid migration)
- Variable tracking
- Error handling

## Archive

The `archive/` subdirectory contains completed development sessions and obsolete notes that are kept for reference but are no longer active.

## See Also

- [../history](../history/) - Historical development timeline and session logs
- [../design](../design/) - Architecture and design documents
